articles.title: Yun Isang Music Institute
articles.content:
Yun Isang Music Institute
     Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Yun Isang Music Institute is a comprehensive music research centre that studies and plays mainly music pieces created by Yun Isang and the traditional Korean music, classical music and famous songs of different countries including those in Europe.
   The institute operating at the Pyongyang International House of Culture was founded on September 27, Juche 73 (1984).
   The institute houses Yun Isang music, traditional Korean music and foreign music research rooms, a creation room and editing and publication departments.
   The Yun Isang music research room makes  researches into the technique to play both the traditional Korean music and European music on a stereophonic basis.
   The traditional Korean music research room is tasked to discover, study and preserve the heritage of Korean music.
   The foreign music research room collects and selects classical music of European countries and typical foreign folk songs and famous songs through a systematic study of them.
   The institute is staffed with a 150-member orchestra band and scores of part-time researchers.
   The institute publishes the magazine "music world".
   The state organizes the Yun Isang concert each year.
   Put on the concert's stage are such works as symphonic poems and cantatas created by Yun Isang.
   The Yun Isang concert and commemoration concerts on various subjects have taken place 17 times till now.
   In November Juche 87 (1998), the Pyongyang  Yun Isang Concert for Reunification was held along with the symposium on Yun Isang music.
   The institute is now preoccupied with the study of new technique of execution and performances.
   Concerts are being regularly held four times each month, to the applause of audience.
   The institute is operating at the state's expense.

articles.title: Revenge-vowing meeting of students of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Revenge-vowing meeting of students of Kim Il Sung University
     Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A revenge-vowing meeting of the students of Kim Il Sung University took place on Wednesday at a time when the voices denouncing the provocations committed by the South Korean authorities in the West Sea of Korea are becoming louder day by day.
   The speakers said that the U.S. imperialists and the South Korean warhawks are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war by continuing to commit naval provocations. This is a premeditated and criminal move to destroy our socialist system by force of arms, they noted.
   The speakers solemnly warned that if they unleash a war of aggression, the Korean people and people's army will deal a crushing blow to the aggressors, provocateurs, to give vent to pent-up grievance and resentment.

articles.title: Successful '99 grand pro-reunification festival vowed
articles.content:
Successful '99 grand pro-reunification festival vowed
    Tokyo, June 29 (KNS) -- A joint meeting of members and executive secretaries of the association of Koreans in Japan for peaceful reunification and the headquarters of Koreans in Japan of the national alliance for the country's reunification (pomminryon) was held in Tokyo on June 28. It discussed the measures contributable  to successfully holding the '99 grand pro-reunification festival for independence and great unity of the nation, the tenth pan-national rally.
   Chairman of the association Ri Jong Hwal and chairman of the headquarters Choe Il Su delivered reports at the meeting. They underscored the need to hold without fail the '99 grand pro-reunification festival for independence and great unity of the nation, the tenth pan-national rally scheduled at Panmunjom on August 15.
   They said that the festival this year should demonstrate The united strength of pro-reunification patriotic organizations and figures through the three-party solidarity of the north, south and abroad and make a great contribution to realizing independence and great unity of the nation and opening an epochal phase of national reunification this year, the last year of the '90s.

articles.title: Symposiums on fifth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise
articles.content:
Symposiums on fifth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise
     Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Symposiums of trade unions, youth league and press officials were held on Wednesday on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the great leader President Kim Il Sung's passing.
   Speakers pointed out that the respected President was the great sun of humankind who exalted our era with creations and changes, taking firm hold of the helm of the era and history for a long period.
   The President founded the Juche idea, the great revolutionary idea in the era of independence, with his outstanding ideological and theoretical wisdom to indicate the road ahead of the Korean people and humankind and wisely led the revolution and construction with benevolent politics of love and trust, the speakers said, and went on:
   At each period and each stage of the developing revolution he illumined the road which the trade unions and the youth league  should follow and wisely led them. He performed the immortal exploits in building an ideologically powerful socialist state by putting forth the Juche-oriented idea and theory on the press and devoting himself to training a large contingent of the revolutionary journalists and pressmen all his life.
   They called upon all the officials concerned to unite closer around the respected Marshal Kim Jong Il, carry through with their lives the lines and policies put forward  by him and discharge their obligations and duties in building a powerful socialist state.

articles.title: Unforgettable five years covered by Korea
articles.content:
Unforgettable five years covered by Korea
     Pyongyang , July 1 (KCNA) -- The past five years covered by the Korean revolution represent a history in which the Korean people prayed for the eternal memory of the great leader President Kim Il Sung, defended the red flag and turned out to build a powerful nation, says Rodong Sinmun today in a political essay with the approach of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
   Five years are just a brief period in a history, but the five years covered by the Workers' Party and the people of Korea, breaking through the most stern trials, will remain national treasure for all  ages which guarantees the prosperity and happiness of the generations to come, precious treasure which makes it possible to defend the justice of humankind and carve out a bright future, the political essay notes, and goes on:
   The past five years covered by the Korean revolution to remain shining in history represent a history of strong faith, sense of moral obligation and love of the country and the nation, in which Marshal Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the revolution, weathering all kinds of hardships and privations, with his unbounded loyalty to the late leader and noble sense of obligation to all generations to come.
   His morality and conscience are natural disposition that makes the darkened sun shine again,  his confidence and will are strong enough to work such a miracle as putting an end to the wrong history and making a new one instead and his love and enthusiasm are  enduring fire that makes most beautiful flowers bloom on  devastated and frozen land.
   The history of his total dedication to the leader's  immortality is a bible of his ever-lasting morality and conscience,  the history of his indomitable struggle to defend the red flag is a heroic epic on his  firm confidence and will and the history of his guidance over the building of a powerful socialist country is  an enduring hymn of his love for the nation and people.
    This past 5 year-long history represents the most glorious  history of thought, philosophy, morality, politics, military affair, economy and culture in which the legendary great man's  ideas, spirit, philosophy, exploits and experience are brilliantly recorded . 
   Every day of the  five years  spent by the Marshal is as precious as national treasure.
   The political essay underscores the need to survey and put on record not only significant feats he performed but also every word he said, every step he made and every anecdote related to his revolutionary activities without fail and hand them down to all posterity.
   Noting that a great history predicts a rosy future, the political essay concludes that Korea's future in the 21st century will be bright.

articles.title: President Kim Yong Nam greets Sudanese President
articles.content:
President Kim Yong Nam greets Sudanese President 
     Pyongyang , July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, President of the Republic of Sudan, on June 29 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the revolution in Sudan.
   The message wished the President and people of Sudan greater success in their work  for nation's stability and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will further develop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from new Tunisian ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from new Tunisian ambassador
     Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from  new Tunisian ambassador   to Korea Lahbib Mohamed Mongi at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
   The President had a talk with the ambassador at the end of the presentation.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister meets new ambassador of Sudan
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister meets new ambassador of Sudan
   Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today met and conversed with newly-appointed Sudanese ambassador to Korea Abdel Hameed Abdeen Mohammed who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Greetings to Belarussian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Belarussian President
     Pyongyang , July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Alexandr Grigoryevich Lukashenko, President of Belarus, on the occasion of its National Day.
   Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the Belarussian President and people successes in their work for the country's progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Vice minister-level meeting in Beijing
articles.content:
Vice minister-level meeting in Beijing
     Pyongyang , July 1 (KCNA) -- The third north-south vice minister-level meeting was held in Beijing at 3 p.m. today.
   The head of our side at the meeting, citing detailed data, said that the south side refused to admit the due responsibility for the incident of armed provocations in the West Sea of Korea and make an apology to our side and thus led the meeting to a stalemate.
   He raised the following epochal proposal to break the deadlock  of the meeting:
   Firstly, the south side should give our side an acceptable answer of any form as regards the incident of armed provocations in the West Sea.
   Secondly, the south side should hand over to our side the plan to ship 100,000 tons of remaining fertilizers as the north and the south already agreed at the Beijing contact, and when the first ship is sent, the fourth meeting should be held and the basic problem be discussed.
   The south side, far from expressing understanding toward our side's epochal proposal and showing an affirmative response to it, asserted that they could not give the plan to the north, contrary to the agreement already reached between the north and the south.
   Our side expressed regret at this attitude of the south side and positively proposed to hold a contact of chief delegates of both sides.
   At the contact our side showed the south side a statement on a recent serious incident caused by the south side by letting an insane person get on our nerves through mass media and demanded the South Korean authorities give a responsible answer.
   The south side avoided giving an answer.
   The date of the next meeting will be fixed when the south side is prepared to give a responsible answer to our side's epochal proposal and statement and notifies our side about this.
